{{cpp/regex/basic_regex/title|imbue}}
{{cpp/regex/basic_regex/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|
locale_type imbue( locale_type loc );
}}

Replaces the current locale with {{c|loc}}. The regular expression does not match any character sequence after the call.

Effectively calls {{c|traits_i.imbue(loc)}} where {{tt|traits_i}} is a default initialized instance of the type {{tt|Traits}} stored within the regular expression object.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|loc|new locale to use}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The locale before the call to this function. Effectively returns the result of expression {{c|traits_i.imbue(loc)}}.
